mapper.insert: insert into t_merchant_place (name , franchisee_id , phone , merchant_area_id , longitude , latitude , address ,tenant_id , del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{franchiseeId}, #{phone}, #{merchantAreaId}, #{longitude}, #{latitude},#{address}, #{tenantId}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update t_merchant_place set del_flag = #{delFlag},update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.sql: id, name , franchisee_id , phone , merchant_area_id , longitude , latitude , address ,tenant_id , del_flag, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select from t_merchant_place where del_flag = 0 and id = #{id}

SELECT t.id, t.NAME, t.franchisee_id, t.phone, t.merchant_area_id, t.longitude, t.latitude, t.address, t.tenant_id, t.del_flag, t.create_time, t.update_time FROM t_merchant_place t
order by t.id desc limit #{offset}, #{size}
